meanings.sent1: The lamp was plugless, so I couldn't turn it on.
meanings.sent2: She preferred using the plugless charger for her phone.
meanings.sent3: The plugless toaster was a real head-scratcher for the tech-savvy crowd.
meanings.sent4: The plugless vacuum cleaner glided effortlessly across the floor.
meanings.sent5: The plugless device was a game-changer for those tired of tangled cords.
